name: Subscription Create
description: Creates a subscription for the member.

input.label: Next Renewal Date
input.name: next_renew
input.description: When should the subscription next renew? If blank Zenbership will auto-calculate based on the product's settings.

input.label: Price Override?
input.name: price_override
input.description: If you would like to override the standard product price, input the price above.
